java/liquibase/database/sql/DropViewStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class DropViewStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String viewName;
00010 
00011     public DropViewStatement(String schemaName, String viewName) {
00012         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00013         this.viewName = viewName;
00014     }
00015 
00016     public String getSchemaName() {
00017         return schemaName;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getViewName() {
00021         return viewName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00025         return "DROP VIEW " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getViewName());
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00029         return ";";
00030     }
00031 
00032     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00033         return true;
00034     }
00035 }
